407    /**
408     *  <p>Controls availability of Products for this Store via active/inactive Product Selections:</p>
409     *  <ul>
410     *   <li>Leave empty if all Products in the Project should be available in this Store.</li>
411     *   <li>If only <code>inactive</code> Product Selections with <code>IndividualExclusion</code> ProductSelectionMode are provided, all the Products are available in this Store.</li>
412     *   <li>If all the Product Selections provided are <code>inactive</code> and there's at least a Product Selection of mode <code>Individual</code>, no Product is available in this Store.</li>
413     *   <li>If at least an <code>active</code> Product Selection is provided, only <code>active</code> Product Selections are considered to compute the availability in this Store.</li>
414     *  </ul>
415     * @param productSelections value to be set
416     * @return Builder
417     */
418

593        return this.name;
594    }

629     */

634    }
635
636    /**
637     *  <p>Controls availability of Products for this Store via active/inactive Product Selections:</p>
638     *  <ul>
639     *   <li>Leave empty if all Products in the Project should be available in this Store.</li>
640     *   <li>If only <code>inactive</code> Product Selections with <code>IndividualExclusion</code> ProductSelectionMode are provided, all the Products are available in this Store.</li>
641     *   <li>If all the Product Selections provided are <code>inactive</code> and there's at least a Product Selection of mode <code>Individual</code>, no Product is available in this Store.</li>
642     *   <li>If at least an <code>active</code> Product Selection is provided, only <code>active</code> Product Selections are considered to compute the availability in this Store.</li>
643     *  </ul>
644     * @return productSelections
645     */
646
647    @Nullable
648    public java.util.List<com.commercetools.api.models.store.ProductSelectionSettingDraft> getProductSelections() {
649        return this.productSelections;
650    }
651

653     *  <p>Custom fields for the Store.</p>
654     * @return custom
655     */
656
657    @Nullable
658    public com.commercetools.api.models.type.CustomFieldsDraft getCustom() {
659        return this.custom;
660    }
661
662    /**
663     * builds StoreDraft with checking for non-null required values
664     * @return StoreDraft
665     */
666    public StoreDraft build() {
667        Objects.requireNonNull(key, StoreDraft.class + ": key is missing");
668        return new StoreDraftImpl(key, name, languages, countries, distributionChannels, supplyChannels,
669            productSelections, custom);
670    }
671
672    /**
673     * builds StoreDraft without checking for non-null required values
674     * @return StoreDraft
675     */
676    public StoreDraft buildUnchecked() {
677        return new StoreDraftImpl(key, name, languages, countries, distributionChannels, supplyChannels,
678            productSelections, custom);
679    }
680
681    /**
682     * factory method for an instance of StoreDraftBuilder
683     * @return builder
684     */
685    public static StoreDraftBuilder of() {
686        return new StoreDraftBuilder();
687    }
688
689    /**
690     * create builder for StoreDraft instance
691     * @param template instance with prefilled values for the builder
692     * @return builder
693     */
694    public static StoreDraftBuilder of(final StoreDraft template) {
695        StoreDraftBuilder builder = new StoreDraftBuilder();
696        builder.key = template.getKey();
697        builder.name = template.getName();
698        builder.languages = template.getLanguages();
699        builder.countries = template.getCountries();
700        builder.distributionChannels = template.getDistributionChannels();
701        builder.supplyChannels = template.getSupplyChannels();
702        builder.productSelections = template.getProductSelections();
703        builder.custom = template.getCustom();
704        return builder;
705    }
